txt.en: On completion of this quest you will receive Umbar proficiency and Umbar mastery in the Metalsmith profession.\n\nDo you want to continue?

Completing this quest will grant you Master proficiency and Master mastery in the Metalsmith profession.\n\nTalk to me again to complete this quest.
